website_summaries.verdict: Strong charge that holds up even with old machinery.
pros: High marks all around for its durability and ability to meet most's expectations
Charges efficiently with a BLACK+DECKER charger
Reviews suggest this charger is just right
cons: Minimal complaints in regard to its ability to hold a charge

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap batman! Great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap batman! Great upgrade, I never realized how weak my old original battery was till I charged up and used these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought an electric Black & Decker pole saw from a yard sale for $5... bought this double pack of replacement batteries and the thing runs like new!
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: I love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have really bad arthritis, In my hands, my back, and my hips. Since I have been using the 500 ml Hemp Oil I have gotten rid of the constant pain that I have had from arthritis. I hope I never have to do without this product ❤️🙏
customer_reviews.author: Libby Ing

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm at a fraction the store price.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the high price that the store charges for these batteries, it was a fantastic day that I found these refurbished Batteries from Lenoge that work perfectly at a great price. I'm a customer for as long as I use the Black and Decker Tools.
customer_reviews.author: inspectorrick

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: These were terrible. The battery would not accept a charge from the original black and decker charger. I would highly recommend buying a new set instead of wasting money on these. Keep in mind, the old batteries still accepted a charge from the charger, so I know they (both original chargers) still work.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: These things are great!
customer_reviews.text: So much more powerful than the original batteries that came with my trimmer. On a full charge I can do all the trimming on my property twice, whereas my old batteries would die before finishing once, even when they were newer.
customer_reviews.author: K. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great Replacement Batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Great Replacement Batteries! I am using these to replace the worn out batteries that came with my tools. They last longer then originals when they were new. Had them a couple months and NO complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T Solberger

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in May and only needed them now. I needed one, today, and it had held its charge all season and my task was completed in mere moments. Well done.
customer_reviews.author: tooslow

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be working well with my Black and Decker yard tools. They charged up well, fit my chargers, and performed very well. I have had them for about a month so far.
customer_reviews.author: Busia

customer_reviews.title: Two Is Better Than One
customer_reviews.text: What's better than one battery is two. The battery for my Black and Decker chainsaw died. Now I can have one charging while using the other!
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Work Great so Far
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used these much yet, but they did charge up well on the original charger. They fit the tree trimmer perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great replacements.
customer_reviews.text: Original batteries have seen better days! The new ones are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Function good. Seem to work fine using B & D ...
customer_reviews.text: Received as advertised. Form, Fit, Function good. Seem to work fine using B & D charger! Fast shipping and good packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey99

customer_reviews.title: Lenoge 18V
customer_reviews.text: The batteries die after about 10 minutes of running. I have to keep switching them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley Pierre-Louis
